      • resize

        public void resize()
        Resize of the window is done. Need updating to cascade down the hierarchy tree to allow for different sizes of windows, which currently is not supported.

      • run

        public void run()
        The main run loop. Terminates when game state finishes or OS sends close request.

      • update

        public void update()
        The update method that's ran once every frame. Cascaded down to other classes for handling their own update methods.
